ProjectTitle: The role of sample characteristics in the stability of value-added estimates of school effects: sample size, student mobility and sample heterogeneity.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/07/2023
Be aware that FWO are since October 2022 expecting that a data management plan for an FWO project to be written using the Flemish Standard DMP template, so you may want to convert your DMP to that. Guidance here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp

For data sharing you can use KU Leuven RDR to deposit the Flemish data (instead of available on request): https://rdr.kuleuven.be/
label: good with suggestions
